content.p: Cookies help us to give you the best experience on our website. You can change your cookie settings if you wish. Otherwise we'll assume you're OK to continue.OKSee our policy There are almost a million print and ebooks available for you to use in our libraries but we know from your feedback that we don't always have what you need. You can request more books if we do not already have what you need in our libraries or we do not have enough copies for you to use. Log into NUsearch to access request forms If we don't have it, we can obtain items for you to borrow from elsewhere. Sign into NUsearch and choose the Interlibrary Loan option from the main menu Request an Interlibrary Loan If you've been waiting a long time or don't think we have enough copies, please email us. Have you already requested the book on NUsearch? If not email us for more copies. Tell us if we need to buy more copies The Suggest a book facility allows you to recommend new books for wider academic reading. Sign into NUsearch and choose the Suggest a book option from the main menu Recommend a book for purchase We're committed to improving the diversity of our leisure reading collection throughout the year. Use this form to suggest titles for our collections from underrepresented voices. DiversifyU suggestions Request items to support your teaching? Can't find a book on the shelves? Report a missing book King's Meadow Campus Lenton Lane Nottingham, NG7 2NR Please see our Help and support page for telephone and email contact points
